1.title: The Pilot!

episode of.title: Killing Time with Graham Denman (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Our frightful host Graham Denman breaks down "Holliston" season 3, Demon Night, Tales of Halloween, "Ash vs. Evil Dead," and Creep. It's a bloody good time.

2.title: A Bloody Good Time!

episode of.title: Killing Time with Graham Denman (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Our horror hound, Graham Denman, gives you the breakdown on Shriekfest, the Visit, Monster Squad and more. It's a bloody good time.

3.title: Bare Bones

episode of.title: Killing Time with Graham Denman (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: This week our ghoulish host, Graham Denman, reviews 'The Mist' coming to TV, Addams Family music, two blu ray reviews, and much, much more. Check it out. It's a bloody good time.

4.title: Wes Craven Tribute

episode of.title: Killing Time with Graham Denman (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: This week Killing Time pays tribute to the Master - horror icon, Wes Craven.

5.title: Kawinkydink

episode of.title: Killing Time with Graham Denman (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Our creepy captain, Graham Denman, dishes out this week's highlights including Shreikfest, Halloween in theaters and two big blu ray reviews. It's a bloody good time.

6.title: The Awesome 90s

episode of.title: Killing Time with Graham Denman (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Come join our devilish host, Graham Denman, as he takes you back to the 90's to relive his top five underrated horror films of the decade. It's a bloody good time.

7.title: Graham's Ultimate Bare Bones Blu-Ray Review. Seriously.

episode of.title: Killing Time with Graham Denman (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: This week our hellish host, Graham Denman, dishes up deadly news on Shout Factory productions, an awesome Friday the 13th video game, his greatest Bare Bones Blu-Ray Revue and more. It's a bloody good time.

8.title: The Awesome 90's, Take Two

episode of.title: Killing Time with Graham Denman (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Devilish host, Graham Denman, takes you back, again, to the 90's to relive more of his top five underrated horror films of the decade in this bloody sequel.

9.title: The Big News Episode

episode of.title: Killing Time with Graham Denman (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: This week our horror hound Graham Denman dishes scoops on The Dark Tower casting, Universals horror legends reborn and his big news. It's a bloody good time.
